places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Narendra Palace
address: Pindari, Munsyari - Thal Road, Kailkhuriya, Bageshwar, Uttarakhand 263642, India

reviews.text:
Best for multiple events.
Rooms are beautiful.
Restaurant with beautiful river view & delicious food . We have celebrated birthday, anniversary, weddings, engagement & many parties happily. Owner & staff are so cooperative.

"The location was perfect - close to the city centre and attractions. The hotel had great facilities and was very convenient.” Fresh welcoming faces all around

Buffet breakfast is too delicious.

Hope to see you soon guys

Good vibes only !
5:30am yoga classes on terrace.
A good breakfast buffet was waiting seating towards the river Saryu.

Fresh environment
Cosy big size rooms
Awesome variety of food & drinks
The accommodations and service offer excellent value. The location is stunning, providing clear views of the river stream (Gomti river I believe) from both the common area and cafeteria.

Cool place to hang- out with friends & family.
We always enjoy our stay being frequent to these landscapes.

#Homely, clean environment.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Deep Palace

reviews.text: We chose hotel Deep Palace for my sister's colleagues from Norway, France and Spain for her wedding in Bageshwar. This has been very great experience for all of them. The owner takes personal attention to all the needs and services. They have the cleanest room and very good service. We requested food as per the guests food habits and they were provided with it. We will be always thankful for the owner's hospitality.
Nice hotel on road location price per night Rs 700-900 depends on your bargaining skills.
The hotel was good but the Verity of dishes was small

If not the best, Hotel Deep palace is one of the best hotels in the locality. With well trained staff full of hospitality and smiling faces, we were treated well throughout the stay. The hotel is located just alongside the main road so didn't have to roam around much. The rooms are cosy and centrally heated as such you won't have to worry about the cold. The food tasted great and the other facilities were also good. The only drawback was the parking space as it's shared with the neighbouring Reliance Trends also. Overall a great stay, would definitely recommend.

This is the worst hotel I have been to in my life. I booked this in October 2021 after looking into the good Google reviews, talking to the owner over phone and reached the place.
The rooms are the worst with spider webs all over the room, bathroom, no grills in the bathroom, there was no lock in my room and the owner temporarily fixed it.
The rooms, bedsheets had not been cleaned since months and had to request them to change. The replacement’s were also unclean and not ironed.
The manager, cleaners and owner weren’t professional at all.
I visited with family and couldn’t stay in such a place so moved to another close by hotel after an hour.
Please don’t visit the place.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Siddhartha
address: Bhauli, Bageshwar, SH-11, Bageshwar Road, Bageshwar, Bageshwar, Bari Khalsa, Uttarakhand 263669, India

reviews.text: For rooms I have shared details below. The rooms were dirty. The service was very poor and careless. What to talk about service. There was a landline phone but it was damaged. The beds were of very poor quality. If you are planning to come and stay in this hotel, then ease change your decision. Stay in any other hotel.

It is one of the oldest hotel in Bageswar, uttarakhand. Rooms is okay, it is beside the Gomti river , so there is a good view of river from this hotel. No food is served, but there is attached restaurant and nearby restaurant from where one can easily take the food. Room door should be locked, otherwise monkey may take your things from the room.
Centrally located budget hotel.Rooms are ok clean with attached bathroom, hot water facility, free parking. Restaurant for basic food. Affordable price.
The hotel is located in Main Market and at the same time on River Bank. Rooms are quite spacious and clean. Bedsheets, Toilet were also clean. Overall experience is quite good in budget prices.
Very good hotel and very good staff

places_with_reviews.name: KMVN TRH Bageshwar

reviews.text: No maintenance। In very bad shape। Need immediate attention from higher authority

A very economical and reliable place to stay if one is looking for a break in the journey.
Don't keep high expectations from this place in terms of rooms and service.
It is a  govt owned place to provide accommodation at very reasonable rate to tourists.
The only comforting factor is that as tourist one will not be fleeced by the touts, and also the tie up they have with taxis ensures that a taxi is made available to you at the govt approved rates.

Huge construction, lots of rooms. When we reached no power, neither provision of power back up. Neither the attendant was interested in the allotment of the room. As summer was there.
Good parking space. No guests in the TRH.

Great infrastructure, but poorly maintained, open/broken electrical wiring in the room, wooden almirah eaten by termites, plenty of webs created by spiders. Concerned authorities should take immediate steps to maintain it. Kitchen works as per the order. Rooms should be stuffed with electrical kettle etc to make tea coffee etc so that one can prepare it at odd times. Room sizes are more than good, what we get at private hotels at a cheaper rates. Lots of parking space for parking cars.
Nice place to stay.. Old but neat and clean. services is good. parking is available. Location is good.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Vivek
address: Tehsil Road, Bageshwar SH-37, Bageshwar Rd, Bageshwar, Kaphalkhet, Uttarakhand 263642, India

reviews.text:
Dirty and leakage in toilet, insects on bed.
No Parking, no regular power supply
Staff rude.
Power points are loose
Don't order any food items from the menu.. You can visit any nearby restaurants *Recommended : Pahadi BOYS Restaurant

The bathroom was cleaner than most available in the area but it was still not clean enough. There was no view from the room and the window was not visible from bed. So you miss out on morning sunshine and views. The location is good , it’s located at the centre of the city.

Such a nice place.
Infrastructure is very well.
It provide hygienic atmosphere, atm is near by it.
Staff is well behaved.
Food is tasty nd healthy
Main thing also give facilities of catering.
Must choose to stay if u r seeking for an Adobe in baheshwar

Hotel Vivek is located right on the banks of the Sarayu River. One gets a great view of the river, which incidentally has crystal clear blue water, and the pine trees covered mountains. The rooms are great for moderate budget. The restaurant serves variety of Indian cuisine. It has a open parking right across the street. Not too many options for lodging in Bageshwar town, hence Hotel Vivek serves your purpose as the price of the rooms is reasonable.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Bhavishya inn
address: PWD Tiraha, Kathayatbara, Bageshwar, Uttarakhand 263642, India

reviews.text: Decent hotel with great location. Rooms are clean, staff is friendly, parking space is available.

Amazing hotel, great service staff helpful professional management  and always available happy to help looks after well
I will recommend this property to everyone if you want to enjoy great hospitality at the Pindari Glacier road  on the bank of Saryu and within the city of BAGNATH JI.
It's a good place to live in Bageshwar however the manager will keep asking for pennies!! Better pay first and then take service

As a Tamilnadu resident, I found the hotel to have a fresh and pleasant ambiance. I was able to secure a single room for 700rs for a 24-hour stay, and I was pleased to find that they also offered affordable and delicious food options. I would strongly recommend this hotel to any South Indians seeking accommodations in Bageshwar.

Okay.. at first this place looked bad .. like really bad.. then we entered narendra inn .. and realized how good this place is in bageswar..

The rooms are fine but very good compared to others in the area .. they got fast and good room service, wifi n other stuff ... you will need to bring your own iron though.

Overall the this the best you can find in this town so definitely recommended.
